resources.string: Thank you for reporting this problem. With an estimated 84,000 streetlights in our system, we rely on our customers to notify us of malfunctioning streetlights.

Seattle City Light has a goal to respond to a reported streetlight outage within 10 business days. That means the light will be fixed or, if the repair is more complicated, City Light will contact you with an explanation of the work that needs to be done and how long it could take.
If your light has not been repaired, please send us an email at street.light@seattle.gov. We appreciate your patience as we work to make repairs as soon as possible.
To follow-up with any additional questions regarding your streetlight, please call 206.684.7056.
